repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:16.04 
WORKDIR / 

RUN apt-get update && \
 apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y git gettext python python-pip rpl && \
apt-get autoremove -y && \
apt-get -y clean && \
rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir mkdocs mkdocs-material

ADD requirements.txt / 
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
ADD dockerpuller /app 

RUN mkdir /projects 

ADD entrypoint.sh / 
CMD /entrypoint.sh
